db:abstract.db:para: Visual helper for showing the 3 axes and a grid in a 3D scene.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The X axis is red, the Y axis is green, and the Z axis is blue.
The example scene here has a Sphere at position (0, 0, 0) and an AxisHelper object. With the WasdController helper one can conveniently navigate the scene.

db:section.db:title: enableAxisLines : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables showing the axis lines. The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: enableXYGrid : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables the grid on XY plane. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: enableXZGrid : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables the grid on XZ plane. The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: enableYZGrid : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables the grid on YZ plane. The default value is false.

db:section.db:title: gridColor : color
db:section.db:para: Specifies the color of the grid. The default value is Qt.rgba(0.8, 0.8, 0.8, 1).

db:section.db:title: gridOpacity : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies the opacity of the grid. The default value is 0.5.
